sourcesContent:
<template>
  <div :id="id" :style="{height:height,width:width}"/>
</template>

<script>
  import echarts from 'echarts'

  require('echarts/theme/macarons') // echarts theme
  import resize from './mixins/resize'

  const animationDuration = 2000

  export default {
    mixins: [resize],
    props: {
      callBack: {
        type: Function,
        required: false,
        default: null
      },
      xData: {
        type: Array,
        default: [],
        required: true
      },
      yData: {
        type: Array,
        default: [],
        required: true
      },
      theme: {
        type: String,
        default: 'tech-blue'
      },
      title: {
        type: String,
        default: ''
      },
      id: {
        type: String,
        default: 'chart',
        required: true
      },
      width: {
        type: String,
        default: '100%'
      },
      height: {
        type: String,
        default: '300px'
      }
    },
    watch: {
      xData(val, oldVal) {
        this.initChart()
      }
    },
    data() {
      return {
        chart: null
      }
    },
    mounted() {
      this.$nextTick(() => {
        this.initChart()
      })
    },
    beforeDestroy() {
      if (!this.chart) {
        return
      }
      this.chart.dispose()
      this.chart = null
    },
    methods: {
      initChart() {
        let chartObj = document.getElementById(this.id)

        this.chart = echarts.init(chartObj, 'macarons')

        this.chart.setOption({
          title: {
            text: this.title,
            show: this.title !== '',
            x: 'center',
            textStyle:{
               fontSize: 16
            }
          },
          tooltip: {
            trigger: 'axis',
            axisPointer: { // 坐标轴指示器，坐标轴触发有效
              type: 'shadow' // 默认为直线，可选为：'line' | 'shadow'
            }
          },
          grid: {
            left: '2%',
            right: '2%',
            bottom: '3%',
            containLabel: true
          },
          xAxis: [{
            type: 'category',
            data: this.xData,
            axisTick: {
              alignWithLabel: true
            },
            triggerEvent:true,
            axisLabel: {
              showMaxLabel: true,
              interval: 0,
              formatter: function(value, index) {
                if (index % 2 != 0) {
                  return '\n\n' + value
                } else {
                  return value
                }
              }
            }
          }],
          yAxis: [{
            type: 'value',
            axisTick: {
              show: false
            }
          }],
          series: [
            {
              type: 'bar',
              stack: 'vistors',
              barWidth: '20%',
              data: this.yData,
              animationDuration,
              itemStyle: {
                normal: {
                  //这里是重点
                  color: function(params) {
                    //注意，如果颜色太少的话，后面颜色不会自动循环，最好多定义几个颜色
                    let colorList = ['#c23531', '#2f4554', '#61a0a8', '#d48265', '#91c7ae', '#749f83', '#ca8622']
                    return colorList[params.dataIndex]
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          ]
        })

        let callBack = this.callBack

        this.chart.on('click', function(params) {
          if(params.componentType =="xAxis" ){
            console.dir(params)
            callBack && callBack(params)
          }else{
            console.dir(params.name)
            callBack && callBack(params.name)

          }

        })
      }
    }
  }
</script>
